remarks: Subtracting two polynomials with the same degree and top coefficient gives a polynomial of strictly lower degree.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 25-Nov-2014.)
statement:
dgrsub2.a $e |- N = ( deg ` F ) $.
dgrsub2 $p |- ( ( ( F e. ( Poly ` S ) /\ G e. ( Poly ` T ) ) /\ ( ( deg ` G ) = N /\ N e. NN /\ ( ( coeff ` F ) ` N ) = ( ( coeff ` G ) ` N ) ) ) -> ( deg ` ( F oF - G ) ) < N ) $.
